text:
🗳 WE CANNOT ALLOW CALIFORNIA TO END UP LIKE TEXAS!! 🗳 

I was prepared to vote Yes for this recall without a candidate preference. 

I am saying NO to white supremacy, NO to this expensive waste of taxpayer dollars, and NO to @larryelder 

My full statement 👇🏽👇🏽👇🏽#CARecall https://t.co/HO0kQSlA1h
